name: Lorem_paragraphsTest
description: Unit tests for the Lorem class's paragraphs method.

test_cases.name: testParagraphs
test_cases.description: Tests the paragraphs method of the Lorem class to ensure it returns the correct number of non-blank paragraphs containing periods.

test_cases.name: testParagraphsEmpty
test_cases.description: Tests the paragraphs method of the Lorem class to ensure it returns an empty list when the paragraph count is zero.
